greatings: Greetings, adventurer. Your race begins here.
Move left, right and up to avoid enemies and traps
If you can't dodge, your health will decrease
Over time, your score will increase. Run as far as you can before your health reaches zero.
enemyText: There will be enemies on your way. You can defeat enemies that are below your level with your weapons. Stronger opponents will deal damage corresponding to their level
enemyFlyText: Flying enemies appear in the game. Their level is equal to the level of the world and they deal damage according to their level
coinText: Collect coins to upgrade your heroes
trapText: Avoid the trap. Their level is equal to the world level and they deal damage according to their level
perkText: Pick up bonuses. They can improve your score or heal you
